title: How to Jump Like a Kangoroo

steps.headline: Place your hands in front of you like two paws.
steps.description: You should do this in the same way you see a rabbit in a cartoonized drawing.

steps.headline: Bend your knees slightly.
steps.description: In a way, this is also like a rabbit. Bending your knees will help you jump higher.

steps.headline: Arch your back slightly towards the ground making sure your hands rest right in front of your chest.
Jump into the air and land back down.
steps.description:
Bend your knees when you fall to absorb the jolts from landing. Next, try moving while you jump. Make sure you keep your knees bent to achieve a good jump. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/ef\/Jump-Like-a-Kangoroo-Step-5.jpg\/v4-459px-Jump-Like-a-Kangoroo-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/e\/ef\/Jump-Like-a-Kangoroo-Step-5.jpg\/aid1821401-v4-728px-Jump-Like-a-Kangoroo-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

text:
Place your hands in front of you like two paws. You should do this in the same way you see a rabbit in a cartoonized drawing. Bend your knees slightly. In a way, this is also like a rabbit. Bending your knees will help you jump higher. Arch your back slightly towards the ground making sure your hands rest right in front of your chest. Jump into the air and land back down. Bend your knees when you fall to absorb the jolts from landing. Next, try moving while you jump. Make sure you keep your knees bent to achieve a good jump. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/ef\/Jump-Like-a-Kangoroo-Step-5.jpg\/v4-459px-Jump-Like-a-Kangoroo-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/e\/ef\/Jump-Like-a-Kangoroo-Step-5.jpg\/aid1821401-v4-728px-Jump-Like-a-Kangoroo-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"
